channel.title: Compile help please!

item.title: Compile help please!
item.dc:creator: @teh_codex teh_codex
item.description:
@teh_codex wrote:

[quote=“Bumm85, post:10, topic:393646”]Yes but I’m pretty sure you need a ; after the > 0)
So it should look like this if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights > 0); {[/quote] no you don’t need that.

Here try this. replace your whole command with this

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("mute") && c.playerRights >= 1) {
			try {	
				String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(5);
				Connection.addNameToMuteList(playerToBan);
				for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
							Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i];
							c2.sendMessage("You have been muted by: " + c.playerName);
							break;
						} 
					}
				}

Read full topic

item.title: Compile help please!
item.dc:creator: @Bumm85 Bumm85
item.description:
@Bumm85 wrote:

Yes but I’m pretty sure you need a ; after the > 0)
So it should look like this if (command.startsWith(“mute”) && playerRights > 0); {

Read full topic

also i use a delta source if it is any different than others[/quote]
do you have team viewer pm me your id and pass and pm me what u adding so i can try to fix it i helped my brother with delta for 3 yrs soo
